replies.msg:
另據泰媒Bangkokbiznews消息，阿努霆在發布後又刪除了該條推文內容。衛生部新聞辦向媒體發布消息稱，之前公佈的公告信息需要更改，請等候新的公告。

泰國頭條新聞社向有關部門官員求證，泰國國家旅遊局局長表示，衛生部的這一規定還需要1-2天時間進行進一步的研究和修改，請廣大民眾和遊客耐心等待，不要信謠傳謠。

來自泰國政府旅遊局香港辦事處的初步公告如下：￼
The Thai government has now enhanced precaution and prevention measures for COVID-19. All travelers are asked to fill in the public health declaration form and those traveling from China /Hong Kong and Macau will undergo 14 days quarantine when they enter the kingdom. Details of quarantine procedure will be announced shortly.

If any passenger is found with high body temperature or related symptoms, the Ministry of Public Health officers at all Thai airports will escort the passenger for an additional check-up immediately.

We advise all travelers to consider carefully whether they still want to pursue their journey. Please maintain good personal hygiene while visiting the kingdom should the travel be necessary. All travelers should ask your respective airline about their flight arrangements.

As the virus continues to spread globally, we will closely monitor the situation and provide updates as soon as we can.
Gg
